content: Welcome to blackjack.fun new promo for the high rollers only. Win cash back. Where you will get back of your money if you lose by playing on blackjack.fun. That means if you win then you win and if you lose we will give you back your money. You can win cash back up to 50% of your lost fund. So Best of luck guys.Rules Only at least 1-month-old bitcointalk account can joinNo alt account allowedNo cheating allowed, If you try to cheat your fund will be frozenYou would not be referred by someone. Unfortunately, we are not accepting them for this campaign.Wager competition winnings are also counted as also your total winnings. For example, if you deposit 50mbtc and lose but win a wager competition and win 100mBTC then this is counted as a total winning 100mbtc. No cash back in this case.Winning will be cleared after your first withdrawal. Then you can play as a normal player.You can play any games on our platformOnly one deposit during this campaign period will be allowed to win cash back. That means if you lose your total first deposit then you can win the cashback the first time. but if you deposit again twice or more then you will be counted as a normal player and you will not win cash back. Project owner deserved the right of changing any rules, disqualify any participant and stop the campaign at any point if they wantHow much you will win1. Deposit 100mbtc or above win 35% cash back2. Deposit 250mbtc or above win 40% cash back3. Deposit 500mbtc or above win 45% cash back5. Deposit 1BTC or above win 50% cash backHow You applyPm your blackjack.fun UsernamePlz let us know your deposit/Starting balance via pm me or blackjack.fun id. No need to post your username and deposit amount in this thread due to user privacy.Time7 days from now
